snippet.title: Maze (Acornsoft) for the BBC Micro
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Maze is a first-person maze game in which you have to get 3 coloured tags to open a chest which contains a key and then use the key to get to the next level with the elevator.
There are robots patrolling the mazes and if a robot comes to close to you, you die. Luckily, you have a gun with 3 bullets to shoot the robots.
You only have 3 lives. If you get killed you start at the elevator.
